mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zhousb_blog( id , title , type , content , preview, remark , state , pv , gmt_create , gmt_modified ) VALUES( #{id} , #{title} , #{type} , #{content} , #{preview} , #{remark} , #{state} , #{pv} , NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT zhousb_blog.id, zhousb_blog.title, zhousb_blog.type, zhousb_blog_type.`name` typeName, zhousb_blog.content, zhousb_blog.preview, zhousb_blog.remark, zhousb_blog.pv, zhousb_blog.gmt_create, zhousb_blog.gmt_modified FROM zhousb_blog LEFT JOIN zhousb_blog_type ON zhousb_blog.type = zhousb_blog_type.`key` WHERE zhousb_blog.state=0 and zhousb_blog.id = #{id}
